sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Firefighter Training Leave of Absence Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Firefighter Training Leave of Absence Act.

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: Leave of absence for firefighter training.
sections.text: Leave of absence for firefighter training.

sections.heading: Rules. The Department of Central Management Services and the Comptroller shall adopt joint rules to develop procedures for the implementation of this Act
sections.text: Rules. The Department of Central Management Services and the Comptroller shall adopt joint rules to develop procedures for the implementation of this Act.
